relation: Wash, sanitize and dry bowls, seats, urinals, washbasins and mirrors
Dust all sills, partitions, ledges and exposed piping
Damp wipe waste can exteriors and interiors
Fill dispensing units with toilet tissue, paper towels, and soap
Weekly Sweep, wash and sanitize floors Daily (M-F)

textBeforeTable: Except where noted, the following services are performed Monday through Friday, once per day, between the hours of 6 A.M. and 2 P.M. Please note that some restroom locations are cleaned in the evenings. Columbia University Medical Center Facilities provides routine custodial maintenance of lavatories / restrooms. After hours, please call Public Safety at 212-305-7979 Flooding should be immediately reported to the CUMC Service Center 212-305-4357 (5-HELP) Hours of Operation: 9:00 AM – 5:00 PM, M-F Z Y X W V U T S R Q P O N M L K J I H G F E D C B A How are we doing? Facilities Services News & Announcements Contact Facilities Management Staff Directory Work Order System Buildings Service Rates A to Z Listing Overview of Services Facilities Services
textAfterTable: Other issues (drips, broken soap dispenser, etc.) should be reported using our online service request. There is no charge for routine custodial maintenance of lavatories. Need Help? Contact Facilities Management 212-305-Help (4357), select 'Option 3' cumc.facilities@columbia.edu Monday-Friday: 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. All other times, call Public Safety at 305-8100 for routine matters or 305-7979 for an on-campus emergency. Facilities Operations 650 West 168th Street Black Building, Room B-02 New York, NY 10032 Tel: 212-305-4357 (Option 3) Fax: (212) 305-1026 cumc.facilities@columbia.edu Parking Office 650 West 168th Street Black Building New York, NY 10032 Tel: 212-305-4357 (Option 7) Fax: 212-305-1026 cumc.parking@columbia.edu
